name: Which "Ocean" Is It? Quiz | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: From which movie does this quote come? "It will be nice working with proper villains again"
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 11.

	In "Ocean's Eleven", Rusty retrieves Basher from a bank where he was just arrested for attempted theft. Portraying an FBI agent, Rusty takes Basher into his custody and runs off with him after Basher blows up a police car.

questions.text: "Who died and made you Danny?" In which movie does Turk ask this of Linus?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 12.

	After most of the guys are arrested in "Ocean's Twelve", Linus begins thinking of ways to get the Fabergé egg. When he begins calling out scams that they could try, Turk asks Linus who died and made him Danny. Linus is speechless at the comment.

questions.text: In which movie does Virgil deliver this line? "You're a midget in 34 states."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 13.

	In "Ocean's Thirteen", Virgil and Turk have to change their appearance to keep from getting caught. Turk's reply to his brother is, "Yeah, well, I'm an animal in the other 34." Virgil realizes what his brother says and Turk  says, "24. . .22."

questions.text: Which movie had this line from Rusty? "You used nasty words. I've got sensitive ears."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 12.

	Rusty is at one of the hotels he owns in "Ocean's Twelve" when Terry Benedict calls him and reminds him of the last phone call they had in "Ocean's Eleven". As Rusty is running down the steps to his car, he tells Terry the reason why he hung up on him.

questions.text: Which movie does this answering machine message play? "This is Roman Nagel. If your consciousness absolutely has to intrude upon mine, leave me a message."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 13.

	Roman Nagel is a character used in "Ocean's Twelve" when he creates an image of a Fabergé egg. In "Ocean's Thirteen", Roman is used again to help rig some casino equipment. Livingston needs help getting the casino equipment to work correctly and calls Roman for help. In a deleted scene, Roman shows up at the hotel room and helps Livingston and Livingston begs Roman not to tell the others that he needed Roman to show him what to do.

questions.text: Which movie is this quote from? "I'm gonna get out of this car and drop you like third period French."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 11.

	When introducing the characters who would be helping in the heist of Terry Benedict's casinos in "Ocean's Eleven", Rusty mentions that Virgil and Turk Malloy have nothing to do right at the moment. This is true when the viewers see Turk in a monster truck racing Virgil's toy truck. Turk threatens Virgil when his brother takes his sweet time getting his toy truck to go.

questions.text: In which movie do Rusty, Danny, and Linus make the quote, "The nose plays!"?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 13.

	In "Ocean's Thirteen", Linus plays Lenny Pepperidge. Linus has to don a huge nose for his acting job. He doesn't like the nose much, but the guys want him to keep it because it works for his character.

questions.text: Which movie is this quote in? "There's water in the basement and the pilot light's out."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 12.

	Tess is speaking to Danny over the phone when Terry Benedict drives up in front of their house. Tess uses the statement as signal to Danny that Terry has found out where they live. Danny tells Tess to hang up the phone immediately.

questions.text: "I saw you before you even got up this morning." Which movie does Saul say this to Rusty?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 11.

	In "Ocean's Eleven", Rusty is at the racetrack to tell Saul about their scheme to steal Terry Benedict's money. At the racetrack, Saul tells Rusty all the places that he has seen him.

questions.text: "You're making that up. Ahab with a piggy back is not real." In which movie does Linus say this?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 12.

	In "Ocean's Twelve", Danny, Rusty, and the other guys are in the hotel room going over ways they can break into an agoraphobic's house. Rusty comes up with an Ahab with a piggy back and after hearing it, Linus begins to wonder if it is even a real scam.

questions.text: In which movie does Reuben say this quote, "There's a code amongst guys who shook Sinatra's hand!"?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 13.

	Reuben makes the quote after he realizes that Willie Banks is setting him up in "Ocean's Thirteen". Not long after this moment, Reuben suffers a heart attack.

questions.text: "Uh, do you see me grabbing the gun out of your holster and just waving it around?" In which movie does Livingston say this quote?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 11.

	Again when Rusty is introducing the characters that would be help in the casino heist, Rusty mentions that Livingston Dell is doing some freelancing. The scene shows Livingston working with the FBI. When an FBI agent begins to touch one of Livingston's machines, Livingston swats his hand away and asks the above-mentioned question.

questions.text: Which movie is this quote from? "I was born ready."
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 13.

	Terry Benedict is helping Danny and the other guys in "Ocean's Thirteen" because he doesn't like the way Willie Banks' casino shadows his pool. After Terry walks away, Danny rolls his eyes in front of the mirror.

questions.text: In which movie does Tess ask Danny this question? "You're doing recon work on our anniversary?"
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 12.

	In "Ocean's Twelve", Tess is at home painting their living room when she finds out that Danny has been at a bank and a jewelry store checking out the merchandise. Danny doesn't get a chance to defend himself because Tess won't stop yelling at him.

questions.text: "Do you think we need one more? You think we need one more. All right, we'll get one more." In which movie does Danny say this?
questions.explanation:
Ocean's 11.

	Danny and Rusty are at a bar going over all the guys they have for the heist and Danny makes the comment to Rusty. The last person they hire for the job is Linus Caldwell.
